column1: two  weeks.  In  this  regard  it  is  very  much  important  to  draw  attention  to  the  following

column2: “In the first two years however, even if the budget is not passed, by operation of law, the
budget submitted by the Chairman is the duly adopted budget of the Pradeshiya Sabha
After the first two years, the Chairman must have the budget passed by the Pradeshiya
